articles.author: Rebecca Shabad
articles.title: Senate passes hate crime bill responding to wave of violence against Asian Americans - NBC News
articles.description: The Senate passed legislation Thursday targeting anti-Asian hate crimes after a spate of incidents that increased during the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The Senate passed legislation Thursday targeting anti-Asian hate crimes after an uptick of incidents during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Lawmakers approved the measure in a 94-1 vote. Sen. Josh… [+1735 chars]

articles.title: Juries tend to give police the benefit of the doubt in black deaths - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: There have been three police shootings of black Americans since the Derek Chauvin verdict yesterday.
articles.content: Convictions like Chauvins are extraordinarily rare. Out of the thousands of deadly police shootings in the US since 2005, fewer than 140 officers have been charged and just seven convicted of murder,… [+6879 chars]

articles.title: Brazil COVID-19 cases dropping but relaxing health measures could reverse gains: PAHO - CNA

articles.author: Channel NewsAsia
articles.title: Train To Busan actor to star in, produce US remake of Korean series Trap - CNA
articles.description: Ma Dong-seok, who’s also known as Don Lee, will play a detective investigating a group of hunters who attacked a famous news anchor and his family while on a camping trip. This is a rare instance of an American remake of a Korean show featuring a Korean lead.
